item.description:
!!!! MEN AND WOMEN HOLIDAY SHOPPING SOIREE

Event starts at 2 pm to 7 pm

Order free tickets via Eventbrite:
http://venusandmarsshopevent-efbevent.eventbrite.com/

Once again bringing you the best, always free to attend-Shopping And Social Event of the Year!!!!! Similar to our GDOs, but this time the MEN are invited.... Hence ... " Venus and Mars". Save the date!!!!! Shop for you, shop for him, shop for her... shop for them. Spirits and Cheer will be in abundance. Raffles, goody bags and of course Free top shelf appetizers!

Boston Quincy Marriott

1000 Marriott Drive Quincy, MA 02169 (617) 472-1000 quincymarriott.com


SAVE THE DATE!!!!!! You will be happy you did!!! Gift wrapping will be available.


*****VENDORS... Interested.... Email WWMIEVENTS@comcast.net !*****
item.name: FREE WWMI Event: Venus & Mars Holiday Largest Shopping Soiree' in New England
